title: Kalisia - Cybion (2009) [mp3@VBR]

14 years after their first opus, the "Skies" EP, french guys from Kalisia
are back with a masterpiece of Progressive Death Metal, coming in a
luxurous limited deluxe edition digipack.
The first CD, "Cybion" is a 71 minutes concept album cut in 4 parts :
Part A : Revelation, Part B : Elevation, Part C : Regression and Part D :
Extinction.

The second CD, "Origins", contains a remastered version of the "Skies" EP
and 4 covers from legends of Metal.
